body: This +1 arrow is painted white and has white fletching. If it strikes a foe so that it would normally deal damage, it instead bursts into magical energy that deals nonlethal damage (the same amount as it would deal lethal damage) and forces the target to make a successful DC 11 Will save or fall asleep.
name: Sleep Arrow
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Weapons/Sleep Arrow
